articles.author: Manas Mishra
articles.title: US STOCKS-Futures rise on China stimulus, trade optimism
articles.description: U.S. stock index futures rose on the first trading day of the new decade on Thursday, as fresh stimulus from Beijing to prop up its slowing economy added to the optimism fueled by easing trade tensions and an improving global outlook.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - U.S. stock index futures rose on the first trading day of the new decade on Thursday, as fresh stimulus from Beijing to prop up its slowing economy added to the optimism fueled by easing trade tensions and an improving global outlook.

articles.title: Lebanon receives Interpol arrest warrant for Ghosn: Lebanese judicial source
articles.description: Lebanon received an Interpol arrest warrant on Thursday for ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn, a Lebanese judicial source told Reuters.
articles.content:
BEIRUT (Reuters) - Lebanon received an Interpol arrest warrant on Thursday for ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn, a Lebanese judicial source told Reuters. 
The request, an Interpol red notice that calls on authorities to arrest a wanted person, was received by… [+716 chars]

articles.author: Karthika Suresh Namboothiri
articles.title: Indian rice export rates firm in muted holiday trade
articles.description: Indian rice export prices edged higher this week, buoyed by a stronger rupee and higher local paddy prices, while trade remained thin in rival hubs because of the holiday season.
articles.content:
BENGALURU (Reuters) - Indian rice export prices edged higher this week, buoyed by a stronger rupee and higher local paddy prices, while trade remained thin in rival hubs because of the holiday season. 
Top exporter India’s 5% broken parboiled variety was quo… [+1958 chars]

articles.title: German zoo blaze was caused by New Year gesture gone wrong: police
articles.description: A Chinese lantern, launched by a 60-year-old mother and her two adult daughters in a New Year's Eve celebration, caused the fire at a German zoo in which dozens of animals were killed, including eight great apes, authorities said.
articles.content: KREFELD, Germany (Reuters) - A Chinese lantern, launched by a 60-year-old mother and her two adult daughters in a New Year’s Eve celebration, caused the fire at a German zoo in which dozens of animals were killed, including eight great apes, authorities said.… [+1809 chars]

articles.title: South Africa's rand firms slightly on trade deal optimism
articles.description: South Africa's rand firmed marginally on Thursday, with sentiment towards emerging markets broadly boosted by U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement on the signing of a trade deal with China, and on higher commodity prices.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - South Africa’s rand firmed marginally on Thursday, with sentiment towards emerging markets broadly boosted by U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement on the signing of a trade deal with China, and on higher commodity prices.

articles.title: UK companies turn a little less gloomy over Brexit impact - BoE survey
articles.description: British businesses turned less gloomy last month about Brexit's eventual impact even though they expected the uncertainty to persist for longer, according to a survey conducted either side of Prime Minister Boris Johnson's election win.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - British businesses reported a fall in Brexit-related uncertainty last month, according to a Bank of England survey that was conducted before and after Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s landslide election victory on Dec. 12.

articles.title: German employment hits record high in 2019, but momentum fades
articles.description: German employment reached a record high in 2019 as higher labour-market participation and increased immigration of foreign workers more than offset demographic change, the statistics office said on Thursday.
articles.content:
BERLIN (Reuters) - German employment reached a record high in 2019 as higher labor-market participation and increased immigration of foreign workers more than offset demographic change, the statistics office said on Thursday.

articles.author: Alberto Dabo
articles.title: Former Guinea-Bissau PM Embalo wins presidency; opponent disputes vote
articles.description: Former prime minister and ex-army general Umaro Cissoko Embalo has won Guinea-Bissau's presidential vote, the electoral commission said on Wednesday, but his opponent complained of fraud and vowed to contest the result in court.
articles.content:
BISSAU (Reuters) - Former prime minister and ex-army general Umaro Cissoko Embalo has won Guinea-Bissau’s presidential vote, the electoral commission said on Wednesday, but his opponent complained of fraud and vowed to contest the result in court.

articles.description: Tunisia's designated prime minister Habib Jemli submitted a proposed cabinet to President Kais Saied on Wednesday, but he has not yet publicly announced the names of cabinet ministers.

TUNIS (Reuters) - Tunisia’s designated prime minister Habib Jemli submitted a proposed cabinet to President Kais Saied on Wednesday, but he has not yet publicly announced the names of cabinet ministers.

articles.description: Brazilian financial exchange operator B3 is introducing a new pricing structure that will reduce and simplify fees investors pay to trade stocks and over the counter products, it said in a securities filing on Thursday.

articles.title: Turkey may not send forces to Libya if conflict eases
articles.description: Turkey may hold off from sending troops to Libya if forces loyal to eastern commander Khalifa Haftar halt their offensive against the internationally recognised government in Tripoli and pull back, the Turkish vice president said on Wednesday.

articles.description: Canada's main stock index futures rose on Thursday, supported by fresh monetary stimulus from Beijing and rising Sino-U.S. trade optimism.
articles.content:
Jan 2 (Reuters) - Canada’s main stock index futures rose on Thursday, supported by fresh monetary stimulus from Beijing and rising Sino-U.S. trade optimism.

articles.title: From arrest to flight - key dates in the Ghosn affair
